title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat – the perfect solution for keeping your home, dorm, office, or kitchen warm and cozy this winter!

**Why Choose the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater?**

- **Versatile Power Modes:** Switch effortlessly between 750W and 1500W heating power, or use the fan mode for air circulation. Ideal for any room size, delivering quick and even heat.
- **ETL Certified Safety:** Rest assured with ETL certification, ensuring this heater meets all safety standards. Automatic shutoff at 45 degrees for added peace of mind.
- **Compact Design:** Measuring only 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13" and weighing just 2.6 pounds, this space heater is incredibly portable and can be easily moved from room to room.
- **Rapid Heating:** Enjoy warm air in just 2 seconds with PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) technology. No waiting, no cold spots.
- **Quiet Operation:** With a noise level below 45 dB, this heater is as quiet as a whisper. Perfect for a good night’s sleep or work in peace.
- **Intelligent Thermostat:** Precisely control your space with intuitive thermostat settings, ensuring your room is always at the perfect temperature.
- **Safety Features:** Built with overheat protection and automatic shutoff at 45 degrees, ensuring your safety is our top priority.
- **Ideal for Any Space:** Whether you’re in your cozy home, dorm room, office, or kitchen, this heater adapts to fit your needs and keeps you warm and comfortable.

**Coverage Area:** Quickly warm up to 200 square feet, making it perfect for small to medium-sized rooms.

Don't let the chill win this winter. Upgrade to the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater and experience the warmth and comfort you deserve. Order now and enjoy a winter free from cold drafts and discomfort!
